func.title: SetFoW

param.name: enabled
param.desc: If true, the fog of war is activated, if false, deactivated.

func.desc: Switches the fog of war for one player on or off.
func.remark: Prior to 9.0 OC the player was defined with the player number as an additional last parameter.

example.text: Deactivates fog of war for all players.
